# Form Validation ## Angular (ngx) For Angular, apply the `dsFormControlValidator` directive to a form element to track its validity. The `dsFormControlValidator` must be imported in your module from the `DsCoreFormsModule` in `@ds/core/ui/forms`. ### Template-Driven Forms Angular provides a number of utilities to manage [template-driven form validation](https://angular.io/guide/form-validation#template-driven-validation). In addition, our `dsFormControlValidator` taps into these to properly apply our invalid-state css when necessary. See example below.
### Reactive Forms Angular provides a number of utilities to manage [reactive form validation](https://angular.io/guide/form-validation#reactive-form-validation). In addition, our `dsFormControlValidator`, with the addition of the `[dsFormControlSubmitted]` attribute-directive, taps into these to properly apply our invalid-state css when necessary. See example below.
